for me, CS:GO is waaaaay much better than this one, i am not saying that CS: source is a bad game, it is very entertaining, and has multiple online game modes (a very big advantage), for example death run, zombies, etc

This is a fantastic game and it has loads of fun. It has a fantastic interface and it's gameplay is easy to get used to. Playing this game with friends or playing on multiplayer is what this game is all about. This installment in the series holds up as a great game. I love the voice acting for this game because of how much soul and emotion they pour into the recording. Don't take my word for it, check out the millions of others who have voiced their opinion. Gather some friends and give this one a go because it kicks ass.

11/10 didn't know my mother 12 year olds so much.

For a multiplayer game that is currently 11 years old, it beats almost everything that is available today. The graphics still hold up to an extent, the weaponry is nice and varied, and the modes are really fun. The support for custom maps and mods is what really keeps this game going after all these years. 

Even better is the fact that almost everyone playing is actually "age appropriate." Hence, there will seldom be a squeaker trying to claim he slept with your mom or is "jacked" in real life. Most people playing are actually there for the fun and are really friendly. This is probably due to the fact that "MLG" players always drift to the "latest and greatest" multiplayer game, leaving the real gem behind.

This game really deserves more credit, as its predecessor is what inspired most multiplayer games we know today. So just join a lobby and have fun!

cs: source er nok i føle min mering det beste, CS spil til dags dato. jeg har spillet det lide siden det kom ud, og har MANGE sjove timrer i spilet. mange nætter er gået sammen med venner, hvor vi endte spiller zombie mod søfer eller en god gammel dags kamp. jeg kan HØJT anbefale spillet til alle der leder efter et godt hold spil.
